Embark on a journey of excellence with Alcanza Ship Services, where maritime dreams set sail.

Elevating maritime excellence through innovative ship chandling solutions. As your premier partner in UAE ports, we deliver exceptional quality across technical supplies, provisions, and specialized equipment. Our legacy of 20+ years reflects our commitment to precision, reliability and customer satisfaction. From deck stores to safety equipment, we ensure your vessel receives nothing but the finest support, exactly when you need it.

Our Services Include:

  • Stores: Comprehensive range of Deck, Engine, Cabin, and Bonded stores
  • Provisions: Fresh, frozen, and dry provisions tailored to your crew's needs
  • Technical Supplies: Essential spare parts, safety equipment, and other technical stores

About Us

Who we are?

As a cornerstone of maritime excellence in the UAE, Alcanza Ship Services has been transforming the ship chandling industry for over two decades. Our strategic presence across major ports, coupled with an extensive network of premium suppliers, enables us to deliver solutions that exceed expectations. We take pride in our ability to provide 24/7 support, ensuring your vessel receives top-tier supplies and services precisely when needed. What sets us apart is our commitment to innovation and reliability. From critical engine components to essential provisions, we handle every aspect of ship supply with meticulous attention to detail. Our state-of-the-art logistics system and dedicated team of experts work tirelessly to maintain our position as the region's most trusted maritime partner. Our focus on sustainability and continuous improvement drives us to adapt and evolve in a dynamic industry, ensuring we meet the ever-changing needs of our clients.

Learn More

Alcanza Ship Services has 30 years of experience in ship supply and spare parts. We provide new-built stores to shipyards and technical stores to ports and the offshore oil & gas sector. Recently, we expanded to supply cruise liners, prioritizing the health and safety of seafarers on all vessels we serve.
